structure.unit: Sec. 12-2061. - SURRENDER OF PERMIT; RETIRING VEHICLES FROM SERVICE.

law.catch_line: SURRENDER OF PERMIT; RETIRING VEHICLES FROM SERVICE.
law.text: Owner's permits which shall have been suspended or revoked by the Council shall, forthwith, be surrendered to the taxicab inspector together with the corresponding memorandum permits, and the operation of any taxicabs covered by such permits shall cease. Any owner who shall permanently retire any taxicabs from taxicab service and not replace same within thirty (30) days thereof shall immediately surrender any permits granted for the operation of such taxicabs to the taxicab inspector. (Code 1959 , ยง22-36)
